description:
Luffy and Zoro have been stalled by Hawkins but their fortune looks bright as they are guided by a woman who Zoro had saved. She leads them to a teahouse and to an herbal remedy for the river poison. All the while, old acquaintances look on from a distance!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: De la défaite dans l`air. L`homme de paille attaque !
Defeat Is Inevitable! The Strawman`s Fierce Attack!
Eine sichere Niederlage! – Der gewaltige Angriff des Strohmanns!
Поражение неизбежно! Жестокая атака соломенной куклы!
لا مفرّ من الهزيمة، هجوم رجل القشّ الضّاري!
敗北確定 ストローマンの猛攻!
